features: 【6PCS Lip Tinted & Face Blush】This multi-use lip tint can be used not only as a lip gloss but also as an eyeshadow and blush.

【Moisturizing Effect】This lip tint is enriched with moisturizing and hydrating ingredients to moisturize and nourish dry and chapped lips. It forms a long-lasting coating that retains colorants and moisture without drying out the lips.

【6 Shades Face Blush】Each Liquid Blush Makeup color is very practical. After application, it can weaken the skin tone and highlight the natural beauty. Creamy velvet texture, matte velvet mist makeup, smooth and fit, with a liquefied mist makeup effect.

【Easy to Use】Apply the lip tint to the lips until the stain is even and your lips look voluminous, then leave it to dry to reveal a natural matte finish. If you want to apply it to the cheeks, apply 3 to 6 dots, blending the formula gently with your fingertips or other tool until the desired effect is presented.
【Waterproof & Long Lasting】This pigments lip stain is long-lasting, waterproof, natural Looking, good ideal for everyday wear, stays on all day!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,445 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #6 in Lip Stains

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: These are mini lip glosses just so you know, but the staining last for a long time and I think there are a good range of colors. Looks great when you pair it with a gloss!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these, they are small but you can get a lot of uses out of them. The only thing is for me i found i had to put a lot of product on to show some sort of color. Blending it out makes it look better but when i have the right look after a while the product starts to come off, like in little flakes. So if you put too much on without properly blending it, that might happen. Over all i love them, the packaging in super cute and it smells relatively good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is amazing
reviews.reviewText: I love these products, I wish they made bigger sizes so I could order the ones I use the most. THE COLOR IS FABULOUS AND DRYS ALMOST INSTANTANEOUSLY. I love putting on a lip stain and then being able to put a gloss or balm on top without it coming off. I would say it’s very long lasting as well, I have tried other lip stains and this is probably one of the best ones. I think it lasts for about 4-5 hours and then it does start to fade. My only complaint is that I really only use 3 of the colors it comes with, but a little goes a long way. For this price I will be buying it again. Definitely recommend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great travel kit
reviews.reviewText: The packaging of this product is super cute and durable, the size of each lip tint was smaller than I expected but they contain a surprising amount of product.I found that all the shades were very pigmented and bright, and they apply on the lips smoothly, which is very helpful.However, after having it on your lips, for a few seconds, it starts to feel drying and didn’t feel good on my lips. After wiping off excess, my lips didn’t feel so dry and the color was spectacular.The shades all look beautiful and vibrant while still looking professional and put together. After a day, it is obvious that the pigment has gone away, which disappointed me, because I expected it to last longer.Overall, this product is great for traveling because it is so small, and easy to apply. But going for a permanent lip tint, this product did not work for me. The main issue for me was the short, lasting pigment, other than that this product is amazing and I will continue to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are the cutest lip stains! They are perfect for putting on alone or top with a gloss but it leaves an all day color depending on which one it ranges from “just ate a popsicle” to a blood red vampress look. Plan on getting the other sets too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice selection of cors even for mature skin
reviews.reviewText: But sticky and takes some time to dry.Using with lip balm shortens the life of the color but still very nice and can be quite natural looking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Is nice and i love the colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok for the price
reviews.reviewText: The packaging is super cute. The tubes of product are very small. I only like 3 of the colors. It does stain and last for a few hours, however when it does come off, it comes off unevenly so it looks really odd. When you apply, it stains your inner lip really well, but then you have to apply multiple times for the rest of your lips to blend properly, so it's not the easiest to use. You can put a balm or gloss over it without it coming off too much. It's good for the price, but I probably wouldn't buy it again.
